organization: Reading Bridge (Anoka County Library – Mississippi Library)
details: Provided one-on-one support to 1st–3rd grade students reading below grade level through structured weekly literacy sessions.
Assisted library staff with basic IT support, including software updates, system setup, and troubleshooting technical issues.
Explained technical issues to non-technical users in simple terms and guided them step-by-step to resolve problems independently.
Educated staff on best practices for staying updated with software, tools, and system usage.
Handled technical errors related to computers, digital learning tools, and hardware devices.
Conducted research and development on new tools and technologies and supported planning for training sessions.
Maintained documentation, positive learning and support environment while coordinating with staff to ensure program continuity.
